text: Quartucciu (Cuattùcciu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 13,261 people lived there. Its area is 27.93 km². It is 16 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Quartucciu
